name: Guru Logic
overview: This thinking game, released in 2002 by TeddyWareZ, has a big success in the MSX community, not only because its concept is pleasant but also because it was removed from Internet after some months on special request from Compile/Aiky, the publisher of the original version for Game Boy Advance. It can be seen as a compliment for the MSX coders ! An official version with more contents should appear some day for the MSX system ! The goal of the game is the rebuilding of a matrix by placing bricks at the good location. To do that, you control a canon held by two ducks. Of course, some obstacles are waiting for you : the gray solid bricks can't be moved to another location, the white bricks must be replaced by green bricks and your time to resolve the puzzle is limited.
